00008 #ifndef CSOUNDCHANNEL_H_

00010 
00011 #include <SDL.h>
00012 #include <map>
00013 #include "CSoundSlot.h"
00014 #include "sounds.h"
00015 
00016 // 8 bit sound
00017 #define WAVEFORM_VOLUME_8 5
00018 #define WAVE_SILENCE_U8         128
00019 #define WAVE_SILENCE_S8         0
00020 #define WAVE_IN_U8  (WAVE_SILENCE_U8-WAVEFORM_VOLUME_8)
00021 #define WAVE_OUT_U8  (WAVE_SILENCE_U8+WAVEFORM_VOLUME_8)
00022 #define WAVE_IN_S8  (WAVE_SILENCE_S8-WAVEFORM_VOLUME_8)
00023 #define WAVE_OUT_S8  (WAVE_SILENCE_S8+WAVEFORM_VOLUME_8)
00024 // 16 bit sound
00025 #define WAVEFORM_VOLUME_16 1280
00026 #define WAVE_SILENCE_U16        32768
00027 #define WAVE_SILENCE_S16        0
00028 #define WAVE_IN_U16  (WAVE_SILENCE_U16-WAVEFORM_VOLUME_16)
00029 #define WAVE_OUT_U16  (WAVE_SILENCE_U16+WAVEFORM_VOLUME_16)
00030 #define WAVE_IN_S16  (WAVE_SILENCE_S16-WAVEFORM_VOLUME_16)
00031 #define WAVE_OUT_S16  (WAVE_SILENCE_S16+WAVEFORM_VOLUME_16)
00032 
00033 #define SLOW_RATE      90  // Wait time for resampling PC Speaker Sound.
00034 //#define SLOW_RATE      45  // Wait time for resampling PC Speaker Sound.
00035 // The higher it is, the faster sound is played!
00036 
00037 
00038 class CSoundChannel {
00039 public:
00040  CSoundChannel(SDL_AudioSpec AudioSpec);
00041  virtual ~CSoundChannel();
00042 
00043  void stopSound(void);
00044  bool isPlaying() { return m_sound_playing; }
00045  bool isForcedPlaying() { return (m_sound_playing && m_sound_forced); }
00046  GameSound getCurrentsound() { return m_current_sound; }
00047  void readWaveform(Uint8* waveform, int len, Uint8 channels, int frequency);
00048  template <typename T>
00049  void generateWaveform(T *waveform, unsigned int len, int frequency, bool stereo );
00050  void transintoStereoChannels(Uint8* waveform, unsigned int len);
00051 
00052  short getBalance() { return m_balance; }
00053  void setBalance(short value) { m_balance = value; }
00054  void setFrequencyCorrection(int freq);
00055  void enableHighQuality(bool value) { m_hq = value; }
00056 
00057  void setFormat( Uint16 format );
00058  void setupSound(GameSound current_sound,
00059      unsigned int sound_timer,
00060      bool playing,
00061      unsigned int freqtimer,
00062      bool sound_forced,
00063      Uint16 format);
00064 
00065  void setSoundSlotPtr(std::map<int, CSoundSlot> &pSoundSlot) { m_pSoundSlot = &pSoundSlot;}
00066 
00067 private:
00068     bool m_sound_playing;            // true = a sound is currently playing
00069     bool m_hq;          // true = the sound is high quality
00070     GameSound m_current_sound;        // # of the sound that is currently playing
00071     Uint32 m_sound_ptr;                // position within sound that we're at
00072     unsigned int m_sound_timer;      // used to slow down the rate of playback
00073  bool m_sound_paused;              // true = pause playback
00074     bool m_sound_forced;
00075 
00076     unsigned int m_desiredfreq;      // current desired frequency in hz
00077     unsigned int m_changerate;       // frequency in samples (calculated)
00078     unsigned int m_freqtimer;        // time when to change waveform state
00079     Sint32 m_waveState;                 // current position of the output waveform
00080     short m_balance;     // This variable is used for stereo sound, and to calculate where the sound must be played!
00081     unsigned int m_freq_corr;   // used for correcting PC-Speaker sampling for different frequencies
00082 
00083     SDL_AudioSpec m_AudioSpec;
00084     Sint32 m_waveout;
00085     Sint32 m_wavein;
00086     Sint32 m_volume;
00087 
00088     std::map<int, CSoundSlot> *m_pSoundSlot;   // Pointer to the Soundslots of CSound
00089 };
